name: filter_prep_time_in_minutes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool keto_diet.
Tool description: Dataset of over 450 Ketogenic diet recipes in over 10 categories from Breakfast to Dinner.  Check out encurate.app to manage content on your mobile apps. Contact to feature your app on encurate.app website.
API description: Gives keto recipes within given range of preparation time.
prep_time_in_minutes__lt = Less than
prep_time_in_minutes__gt = Greater than

prep_time_in_minutes_gt.description: Minimum preparation time in minutes. Only recipes with a preparation time greater than this value will be included.

prep_time_in_minutes_lt.description: Maximum preparation time in minutes. Only recipes with a preparation time less than this value will be included.
